articles.title: Trump warns of 'very severe consequences' if Putin continues Ukraine war
articles.description: President Trump has warned Russia of "very severe consequences" if they do not agree to end the war with Ukraine, just hours before his meeting with President Putin.

articles.title: Deadly storms hammer parts of the U.S., millions bracing for severe weather
articles.description: Millions of Americans are bracing for severe weather as Tropical Storm Erin intensifies, following deadly storms that have already caused widespread damage and displacement.

articles.title: Supreme Court orders ECI to publish list of names excluded from Bihar draft roll
articles.description: The Supreme Court has ordered the Election Commission of India to publish a searchable list of approximately 65 lakh names excluded from the draft electoral roll in Bihar, along with the reasons for their non-inclusion.
